attributes.action: Ban all non-standard reporting instances of SITS student reporting system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All users of non-SITS reporting systems should be made to reside in the Tower awaiting the time when capital punishment becomes the favoured option by the then current government, who will of course carry out the pre-determined punishment in a timely manner.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
